oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. J.A. Baylor letter, August 23, 1916. 1 of 3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from J.A. Baylor, President, Ministers Association, M.E. Church, South, to Dr. Brown Ayres, President, University of Tennessee. Written on letterhead from Broad Street M.E. Church, South, Knoxville, TN. Re: Action by the Ministers Association about charges againstProf. Schaeffer. Page 1 of 3. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Clergy; Universities & colleges; Women's rights; Methodist Episcopal churches;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: J.A. Baylor
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
